data.title: Cheap Flights To Jomo Kenyatta International Airport
data.meta_description: Cheap flights and cheap hotels at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport  on Travelstart: ✓ Compare flights ✓ Shops & parking ✓ Get the best airline tickets - Book flights online!
data.text:
Jomo Kenyatta International Airport is the ideal gateway into and out of East and Central Africa. With flights scheduled to destinations in over 50 countries, Jomo Kenyatta International Airport served over 7 million passengers in 2016. Formerly called Embakasi Airport and Nairobi International Airport, the airport was renamed after President Kenyatta sfter his death about five months later on 22 August 1978.

Compare and book your cheap flights to Jomo Kenyatta International Airport with Kenya Airways and popular flight routes from Johannesburg to Nairobi online at Travelstart!

Jomo Kenyatta International Airport caters to a large range of cuisine options. Airport patrons can enjoy a range of food and drink options available at cafés, restaurants and bars.

Find all your essentials and gifts at the shops at Jomo Kenyatta International Airport. Aside from amazing duty-free shops, there are great clothing, perfume, electronics, alcohol and tobacco, and souvenir stores.

Easy Hotel Kenya

Easy Hotel Kenya is one of the newest airport hotels in Nairobi. It is located in the Syokimau area – a 15-minute drive from Jomo Kenyatta International Airport. Amenities include a restaurant, a meeting room, car parking, internet access and business services.

The Lazizi Premiere

The only official hotel located at the Jomo Kenyatta International Airport, The Lazizi Premiere Is only 3 minutes from the terminals. Amenities include a contemporary café, a bar, a conference centre, a swimming pool and airport shuttle services.

Hilton Garden Inn Jomo Kenyatta International Airport

The Hilton Garden Inn Jomo International Airport hotel offers the ideal relaxation. It is a 7-minute drive from Terminal 1E. Amenities include a heated infinity rooftop swimming pool, a fitness centre, and a lounge bar.
